import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import { NavLink, Redirect } from 'react-router-dom' import { connect } from 'react-redux'; function Header({ isModalOpen, showModal ,isResetModalOpen,currentUser,showResetModal,dispatch}) { let [currentUserLocal, setCurrentUserLocal] = useState({}) useEffect(() => { setCurrentUserLocal(JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('currentUser'))) }, []) let user = typeof currentUser == "string" ? JSON.parse(currentUser) : currentUserLocal; function logout(){ localStorage.removeItem('currentUser'); window.location = "/"; } return (
    {/*
    • */}
  • {user?Hello {user.name}:''}
    • {logout()}} className="active" tooltip="Logout" flow="down"> Logout
) } export default Header;
